projects.title: Vulkan Game Engine
projects.description: A 3D rendering engine from the ground up. Implements lighting, supports gltf, object transform hierarchy, etc.

projects.title: Music Visualizer
projects.description: Displays the decoded audio waveform in real-time, accompanied by a frequency spectrum plot

projects.title: Machine Learning Intrusion Detection Tuning Dashboard
projects.description: Allows tuning of various machine learning models without touching code. Has hover-hints for every single hyperparameter in the UI and stores performance metrics for previous configurations.

projects.title: CoD: WaW Zombies HUD Remaster
projects.description: The classic Call of Duty: World at War Zombies HUD brought to Black Ops 3 LUI. This remaster was painstakingly compared to the original to capture the nostalgic look and feel of the iconic heads up display. And yes, that is a flamethrower!

projects.title: Art Commission Tracker
projects.description: A handy phone app specifically tailored to artists who do lots of commissions. Allows 1-touch management of commissions, keeps track of earnings, and is dead simple to use!

projects.title: DLL Injector
projects.description: When modding games, a DLL injector is a necessary tool, so I wrote one! It conveniently displays the process list, image type (32 bit or 64 bit), keeps a quick-list of DLLs you have used in the past, and remembers the last target process to streamline game modding workflows.
